sentence.Network_en: Most of successful men have the characteristics of contumacy and doughty.
sentence.Network_cn: 绝大多数成功人士都有共同的特质：脾气倔强，性格刚强。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇新译 C_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... contumacious 不听令的 contumacy 藐视法庭 contumelious 傲慢的.
controvert v．反驳，驳斥contumacy n．抗命，不服从contumacious adj．违抗的，不服从的
befuddle、使迷惑contumacy、抗命，不服从faze、使狼狈，折磨

list.abs: 2013年5月29日 - (节制情感的,大陆)自己,你最好辅助他,要是他contumacious(不听令的)胆敢 contravene(违反)你的authority,你就replace/supplant了他,让他把皇位demise(.
contumacy n．抗命，不服从contumacious adj．违抗的，不服从的contumely n．无礼，傲慢

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin contumacia 'inflexibility', from contumax (see contumacious)

means.word_mean: 1. willful refusal to appear before a court or comply with a court order; can result in a finding of contempt of court
2. obstinate rebelliousness and insubordination; resistance to authority

auth_sentence.content: He was...gated for a fortnight for disobedience and contumacy.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was...gated for a fortnight for disobedience and contumacy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was...gated for a fortnight for disobedience and contumacy.
